name: places/ChIJVT9xY2RZwokRRh9AxsjFmQ0
adrFormatAddress: 1122 3rd Ave, New York, NY 10065, USA

originalText.text: I went in for a pedicure and gel X nail extensions. A nail person named Wendy serviced me. She started doing my nails and glued two nails that were not the right size after I told her several times I did not think they were the correct size. She glued one of the nails crooked and when I asked for her to correct it she screamed at me and told me she could just file it straight. The nail did not fit and was not glue on correctly it was hurting my finger. Instead of fixing it she screamed at me, made a scene and refused to do my nails. I felt so uncomfortable i decided to pay for the service i had already gotten and leave. A different nail person helped cut the nails I didn’t even want to stay to soak the nails. Most unprofessional place i have ever been to. This was awful. I do not recommend and will not be coming here again. I tipped them $15 in cash and should have left nothing.

originalText.text: Bad experience. They were friendly enough, but I felt very rushed around. Paid halfway through my manicure, which I notice they didn’t make anyone else do? I asked for a French with colored tips and left with a comically bad manicure which is already chipping, not even 24 hours later

originalText.text: Very clean and one of the best manicures I have had in some time.

text.text: Very clean and one of the best manicures I have had in some time.

originalText.text: Bad experience unfortunately because the girls there are super nice. Went in on my lunch break and told the girl I needed to be done in 40 minutes. I appreciated them acknowledging my time, but it ended up being 55 minutes and at the end the girl made it sound like it wasn’t perfect due to her being in a rush. I felt bad saying anything but I did want to tell her it wasn’t a rush being she ended up taking just under an hour anyway . So I left, my left thumb nail was crooked and bumpy. So I went in 4 days later to get the ONE nail fixed; it turned out worse then the first time. Attached is the first time and second picture is the “fixed” nail. I don’t know how they can leave it like that there’s no way they did not see it. Wasn’t going to go back a third time.

originalText.text: Horrible experience. I asked the woman doing my pedicure to clean it up because she painted polish onto my skin and did not cut my cuticles. I spoke to the manager who yelled at me and said they cannot do my manicure and will not serve me as a customer. She even threatened to remove the nail polish I just spent an hour on getting a pedicure. Do not go here if you want a calm experience. Never in my life have I been so disrespected at a nail salon. Then upon leaving, she told me that I wasted the nail tech’s time, all because I asked her to clean up the pedicure. Belligerent and rude manager.
